## ASTNode.next() method

Find the element to the right of the current element in the AST.  An AST node that wraps the next field, connection, block, or workspace. Or null if there is no node to the right.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
next(): ASTNode | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[ASTNode](./blockly.astnode.md) \| null
